name: Blocky Physics
description:
One small hoop. 2 blocks. Slightly annoying controls. Can you get a block into the hoop?

try it

or don't

The game really revolves around two blocks and a hoop. The game is physics based

and you can place a maximum of 10 blocks at a time. There are many means to help you get a block into the hoop, but when you do it's pretty awesome. or maybe i'm just really really bad at my own game.  The controls to pick up and control blocks are intentionally annoying. So good luck with it. 

I don't intend on updating the game a lot but there may be a few minor updates here and there. Mostly a small project for all to enjoy.  With that said I'm open to any suggestions and criticisms anyone has

CONTROLS \\\\\\\\ Building: Enter Build Mode: Middle Click, Exit Build Mode: Middle click while in build mode, Place Block: Left Click Delete Block: Right Click on placed block Enjoy! and yes, i love using every type of text i can
